tool_description: Compares resume content against job requirements to identify keyword alignment and suggest optimization for better ATS compatibility.

resume_content.description: Complete text content of the resume to analyze

job_keywords.description: List of important keywords from the job posting

required_skills.description: Essential skills mentioned in job posting

match_threshold.description: Minimum similarity score for keyword matching (0.1-1.0)

error_messages: Empty keyword list: Provide at least one keyword or skill to match against.
Invalid threshold value: match_threshold must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Insufficient resume content: Resume must contain enough text for meaningful keyword analysis.
usage: Input resume content and job-specific keywords to receive detailed matching analysis and optimization recommendations for ATS compatibility.

overall_match_score.description: Percentage of job keywords found in resume (0-100)

matched_keywords.description: Keywords from job posting that are present in resume

missing_keywords.description: Important keywords from job posting absent in resume

keyword_density.description: Frequency of relevant keywords per 100 words in resume

optimization_recommendations.description: Specific suggestions for incorporating missing keywords naturally
